          <title>
            <string language="en">Rating scale for teacher obsevation</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a Rubric to be used for rating teacher observation in the classroom.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une rubrique à utiliser pour l'observation

            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una rubrica da usare per l'osservazione
